Translations.Text: N’iyo Allah aza guhaniraho abantu kubera ibikorwa byabo bibi, nta kiremwa na kimwe yari gusiga ku isi.Ariko arabarindiriza kugeza igihe cyagenwe, kandi iyo igihe cyabo kigeze, ntibarindirizwa na gato cyangwa ngo bihutishwe mbere yacyo
Bitirira Allah ibyo (ubwabo) banga, kandi indimi zabo zivuga ibinyoma ko bazagira iherezoryiza. Nta gushidikanya ko bazahanishwa umuriro, ndetse bazawinjizwamo mbere (y’abandi), kandi bawurekerwemo

Ku izina rya Allah! Mu by’ukuri, twohereje intumwa ku miryango (Umat) yakubanjirije, ariko Shitani abakundisha ibikorwa byabo (bibi). None ubu ni we nshuti magara yabo, kandi bazahanishwa ibihano bibabaza

Kandi nta kindi cyatumye tukoherereza igitabo (cya Qur’an, yewe Muhamadi), bitari ukugira ngo ubasobanurire ibyo batavugaga ho rumwe, ndetse no kugira ngo (icyo gitabo kibe) umuyoboro n’impuhwe ku bantu bemera
Kandi Allah amanura amazi (imvura) ayakuye mukirere, nuko akayahesha isi ubuzima nyuma yo gupfa kwayo (gukakara). Mu by’ukuri, muri ibyo harimo inyigisho ku bantu bumva
